H0.text: Coal is the substance that is correctly identified as a mineral.

H1.text: Quartz is correctly identified as a mineral.

H2.text: Granite is correctly identified as a mineral.

H3.text: Sandstone is the substance correctly identified as a mineral in the question asking which of these substances is correctly identified as a mineral.

A4.text: Quartz is a hard mineral composed of silica (silicon dioxide).

A5.text: Quartz is classified structurally as a framework silicate mineral and compositionally as an oxide mineral.
